Detailed Description

A light that emits in all directions from a single point.

virtual bool DzPointLight::isDirectional (  )  const [inline, virtual]

Indicates if this light is an infinite directional light.

Directional lights do not have a position per se. They are assumed to lie at infinity and cast parallel rays of light into the scene.

Returns:
true if this light is directional. False for omni-directional lights.

Reimplemented from DzLight.

virtual void DzPointLight::setGLShadow ( int  pass,
int  totalPasses,
int *  shadowMapSize = NULL 
) [inline, virtual]

Sets up the light for rendering to a shadow map in OpenGL

Parameters:
pass If the light is an area light and needs to be jittered during a multi-pass render, this is the index of the current pass.
totalPasses For area lights, this is the total number of jitter passes that will be
shadowMapSize A pointer to an integer that will be set to the size of the shadowmap that is generated by this light.
